title: Available NOW!- Newly Renovated 2 bedroom House next to Greenlake
posting_body: Available NOW!
Your opportunity to live in Greenlake within walking distance!
This newly remodeled 2 bedroom/1bath one level south-facing townhome is now available!
All new electric, plumbing, bath, kitchen, flooring, roof and more!
This is the easy living lifestyle with your own private patio and fully fenced backyard.
Full bath off the main bedroom & 2nd Bedroom is ideal as office/baby room/guest space.
New kitchen features a sunny, bright eating space, tile, quartz countertops, top brand all new appliances & stack washer/dryer.
Off street Parking space available on the backyard.
Street parking right in front of the house is super easy to find.
This home is a walker's paradise (88/100)!
Located near some of the city's best restaurants, greenlake, grocery stores, bus line, etc.
- 5-minute walking distance to greenlake/pcc
- 5-minute walking distance to express bus E line that goes to downtown and south lake union within 10 minutes ride.
- safe, quiet and family friendly neighborhood
- huge south facing windows with abundant lights
- big front yard and backyard with fire pit
- parking space on the right back of the backyard for easy access to the house.
- super easy to find street parking right in front of the house
- huge lockable bike storage/ shed for you to store your bikes and garden tools in the backyard
10-11 month lease required.
Income of 3X rent required.
Minimum 700 credit score required.
Background check required.
One-month rent for deposit & first month and last month rent needs to be paid upfront before move in.
$300 per pet deposit required for all pets upon move-in.
$35/month pet rent for each pet.
